issue.title: [JS] NullVector should include a null data buffer
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4738](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4738). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Arrow C++ and pyarrow expect NullVectors to include a null data buffer, so ArrowJS should write one into the buffer layout.
